title: Need help with a T206 Collins that should not be this hard!
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: Need help with a T206 Collins that should not be this hard!
posts.post_content:
Hello all,
I have been looking for a T206 Eddie Collins witha Sweet Cap 350, Factory 25.

Looking for nearly 2 years without being able to find one.  I will take more than one if I can find them, any grade will do.  I have some SC 350, 30 E. Collins trading stock (one formerly PSA 3.5, now raw, and one G raw), or I can buy, whatever works for you.

I am also looking for AB 350 and Cycle 350 in any condition, raw or graded.

Help a feller out with with a SC 350,25!

Thanks,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]
